label: Instacart
name: instacart
description: Create Instacart shopping lists and recipe lists via REST.

options.label: Create Shopping List
options.name: createShoppingList
options.description: Creates a shopping list on Instacart.

options.label: Create Recipe List
options.name: createRecipeList
options.description: Creates a recipe list on Instacart.

inputParameters.label: Request Body
inputParameters.name: body
inputParameters.description: JSON payload sent to Instacart. Your service posts this verbatim: axios.post(URL, inputParameters.body, { headers: {...} }).

inputParameters.label: Custom Headers (optional)
inputParameters.name: headers
inputParameters.description: Optional additional headers to merge with the default Authorization and Content-Type headers.

inputParameters.label: Debug Logging
inputParameters.name: debug
inputParameters.description: When true, logs request/response details to help with troubleshooting.
